basics.name: Le Phuc Tai
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a software enginner with more than 4 years of experiences specializing in JavaScript (ES6, React, Redux, Webpack, and ExtJS) and Java (Spring, Apache, Hibernate, MongoDB)

location.address: 1050 apartment, 04 Phan Chu Trinh, Binh Thanh

projects.name: Hut Reservation
projects.summary: Developed a single page web application with Java (using Jersey as REST api) and AngularJS. That helps guest, climbers, mountaineers, families reserve hut. Developing offline mode, synchronize data when network reconnect

work.summary: As a developer, I participated in a product team with Agile/Scrum development process. Daily meeting with the team (VN-CH).Clarify requirement with the business owner. Do work breakdown structure for User Story, define impact, implement & write automation test for each new feature in User Story. Collaborating with the customer success team to analyze and support incident.
highlights: Responsible for the quality of a Frontend module that helps to visualize seat maps with D3 & ExtJs.
Backend technologies Java (Spring, SpringMongo, Hibernate), Oracle, MongoDB.
Frontend technologies JavaScript (ExtJS, JQuery, React etc), CSS3 (SASS/LESS), HTML5.
Estimation, design and development various modules.
Bug fixing and maintain the product.
Mentoring new members join the team.
Re-search and sharing new technologies with team members and co-workers.
Coordinating with other teams in the same project.

projects.name: Box Office
highlights: A module mostly is written by ExtJS (except payment), help operators sales their products (tickets/season tickets, etc).
Develop new features for this existing module, bugs fixing.

projects.name: Seat map
highlights: A Frontend module, that helps operator draw and interact with seats which are visualized from a big stadium. Some big seat map with more than 80 000 seats, that means we have to find a way to deal with a big DOM element in application but have to keep good performance for the operator.
Developing as a widget so that can reuse in other places in the application (sales configuration, sale seat map in Box Office module, etc).

projects.name: Ticket shop
highlights: A big module that sales products on the internet from the portal configuration. The purpose is one shop for multiple customers with different customization by the configuration portal. The operator can configure different sales channels (B2C, B2B, etc) to sales products on this module.

Build a scalable resale channel, that ables to display more than 30 000 tickets in a page by seat map instead of a long list ticket items. Using MongoDB to store cached data instead of calling the portal system.

projects.name: Gravity
highlights: Develop widgets (providing as an iframe) for customers so that they can put on their website. An innovative topic, working directly with colleagues in Switzerland.
Implement REST API to provide data for Frontend. Build UI component, widget for final purpose is reused and embedded into customer's website.

education.institution: Ho Chi Minh University of Science
